alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Robeson and north central Dillon Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Maxton, or 7 miles east of Laurinburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Dillon, Red Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Maxton, Rowland, Raemon, Hamer, South Of The Border, Buie, Wakulla, Purvis, Prospect, Little Rock, Elrod, Proctorville, Mcdonald, Orrum, and Raynham. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 191 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
